om.question
Interface Question

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlankQuestion, NullQuestion, SimpleQuestion1, SimpleQuestion3, StandardQuestion
public interface Question

Basic low-level interface that all questions must implement.

Method Summary
 ActionRendering action(ActionParams ap)
          Called when an action is received for the question, i.e.
 void close()
          Called when question is finished with, either after an ActionResponse is returned indicating that the question ended, or if the Web Presenter terminates the question early.
 Rendering init(org.w3c.dom.Document d, InitParams ip)
          Called to initialise new question.
 

Method Detail

init

Rendering init(org.w3c.dom.Document d,
               InitParams ip)
               throws OmException
Called to initialise new question.

Parameters:
d - XML document containing question
ip - Initialisation parameters for question
Returns:
Information needed to render question as XHTML
Throws:
OmException

action

ActionRendering action(ActionParams ap)
                       throws OmException
Called when an action is received for the question, i.e. when the user clicks a form submit button or similar.

Parameters:
ap - Parameters of action (e.g. form parameters)
Returns:
Revised information needed to render question as XHTML
Throws:
OmException

close

void close()
Called when question is finished with, either after an ActionResponse is returned indicating that the question ended, or if the Web Presenter terminates the question early.
